owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getBlobParams(uint16).notice: Returns the blob params for a given blob version

getIsQuorumRequired(uint8).notice: Checks if a quorum is required

getQuorumAdversaryThresholdPercentage(ui.notice: Gets the adversary threshold percentage for a quorum

getQuorumConfirmationThresholdPercentage.notice: Gets the confirmation threshold percentage for a quorum

nextBlobVersion().notice: The next blob version id to be added

quorumAdversaryThresholdPercentages().notice: The adversary threshold percentage for the quorum at position `quorumNumber`

quorumConfirmationThresholdPercentages().notice: The confirmation threshold percentage for the quorum at position `quorumNumber`

quorumNumbersRequired().notice: The set of quorum numbers that are required

versionedBlobParams(uint16).notice: mapping of blob version id to the params of the blob version
